traits.name: Active
traits.description: These Sims tend to be Energized, can Pump Up other Sims, and may become upset if they don't exercise for a period of time.

traits.name: Ambitious
traits.description: These Sims gain powerful Moodlets from career success, gain negative Moodlets from career failure, and may become Tense if not promoted.

traits.name: Cheerful
traits.description: These Sims tend to be Happier than other Sims.

traits.name: Creative
traits.description: These Sims tend to be Inspired, can Share Creative Ideas with other Sims, and may become upset if they're not creative for a period of time.

traits.name: Evil
traits.description: These Sims become Happy around Sims with negative Moodlets, can be Mean to other Sims, and become Angry when witnessing altruistic behavior.

traits.name: Family-Oriented
traits.description: These Sims become Happy and build stronger relationships around family members. They can Discuss Family at any time.

traits.name: Genius
traits.description: These Sims tend to be Focused, can Share Big Ideas with other Sims, and may become upset if they're not intellectually stimulated.

traits.name: Gloomy
traits.description: These Sims tend to be Sad, can Discuss Fears with other Sims, and while sad, gain a boost to their Creative Skill.

traits.name: Good
traits.description: These Sims become Happy when doing good deeds and become Sad when being mean or around Sims with negative Traits.

traits.name: Hates Children
traits.description: These Sims become Tense around children and become Angry when children are loud.

traits.name: Lazy
traits.description: These Sims are harder to motivate and tend to sit around more than other Sims.

traits.name: Mean
traits.description: These Sims become Happy when being Mean or Mischievous to other Sims and become Sad when around positive Moodlets.

traits.name: Music Lover
traits.description: These Sims gain powerful Moodlets from listening to music and can Discuss Favorite Music with other Sims.

traits.name: Outgoing
traits.description: These Sims become Happy when around other Sims and become Sad when alone for too long.

traits.name: Loner
traits.description: These Sims become Tense around strangers, become Embarrassed more often in social situations, but gain powerful Moodlets when alone.
